attributes.action: The introduction of ID cards should only be done if passports and driving licences are abolished
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It seems silly to me that a new ID card should be introduced on top of other forms of ID. If we have to have these cards then why do we still need passports and driving licences and other forms of ID.If the aim of the card is not just a money making exercise then all other forms of ID should be abolished and this will mean that the cost to the tax payer would be no different. ID cards for children and the elderly would be free
